sources.title: The Lower Depths
sources.description: In a Japanese slum, various residents play out their lives, dreaming of better things or settling for their lot. Among them is a man who pines for a young woman but is stymied by her deceptive family.

metadata.Plot: In a Japanese slum, various residents play out their lives, dreaming of better things or settling for their lot. Among them is a man who pines for a young woman but is stymied by her deceptive family.
metadata.Writer: Maxim Gorky, Akira Kurosawa, Hideo Oguni
metadata.Actors: Toshirô Mifune, Isuzu Yamada, Kyôko Kagawa
